TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDsigXPathTransform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform

summary.span: 表示根據 W3C 所定義之數位簽章的 XPath 轉換。

span.span: Represents the XPath transform for a digital signature as defined by the W3C.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您解決使用 XPath 語言的 XML 文件。The class allows you to address an XML document using the XPath language. 這個類別會使用 XPath 運算式，以選取您想要簽署或加密任一密碼編譯作業中移除所有其他的 XML 節點。This class uses an XPath expression to select the XML nodes you want to sign or encrypt while removing all others from either cryptographic operation. 使用來簽署或加密的 XML 文件使用 XPath 運算式的特定部分的類別。Use the class to sign or encrypt specific parts of an XML document using an XPath expression. 如需初始化類別 XPath 轉換字串的值，請參閱方法。For information on initializing the class to the value of an XPath transform string, see the method. 描述統一資源識別元 (URI)類別由定義欄位。The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the class is defined by the field. 如需有關 XPath 轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱 6.6.3 XMLDSIG 規格中，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ W3C。For more information about the XPath transform, see Section 6.6.3 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何簽署與驗證 XML 文件使用信封簽章的類別。The first code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the class with an envelope signature. 這個範例會簽署 XML 文件，並將簽章儲存在新的 XML 文件。This example signs an XML document and saves the signature in a new XML document. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何呼叫的成員類別。The second code example demonstrates how to call members of the class. **範例 #1****Example #1** [!code-cpp[Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigXPathTransform/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigXPathTransform/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigXPathTransform/VB/sample.vb#1)] **範例 #2****Example #2** [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform/CS/members.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform/VB/members.vb#2)]

summary.span: 傳回 物件參數的 XML 表示，此物件適合納入為 XMLDSIG 項目的子項目。

span.span: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of a object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG element.

returns.span: XML 節點的清單，代表 XMLDSIG 項目中描述目前 物件所需要的轉換特定內容。

span.span: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current object in an XMLDSIG element.

summary.span: 將指定的 物件剖析為 項目的轉換特定內容，並將目前 物件的內部狀態設定成與 項目相符。

span.span: Parses the specified object as transform-specific content of a element and configures the internal state of the current object to match the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來初始化使用 XPath 轉換的類別。Use the method to initialize the class with an XPath transform. 初始化使用 XPath 轉換類別中，完成下列步驟。To initialize the class with an XPath transform, complete the following steps. 1. 建立新類別並設定屬性為 XPath 轉換字串的值。Create a new class and set the property to the value of an XPath transform string. 2. 呼叫方法來建立表示轉換的物件。Call the method to create an object that represents the transform. 3. 建立的新執行個體類別，並將先前建立物件方法。Create a new instance of the class and pass the previously created object to the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何簽署與驗證 XML 文件使用類別。The following code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the class. 這個範例會建立信封簽章。This sample creates an envelope signature.
